EmailTemplate.name: SGP_BRD_JC_1705_wines_promo.Send Email - Announcement.Email - Announcement
EmailTemplate.subject: Results for "Stand a chance to win a Vintec wine chiller" lucky draw
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=]]>.
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Congratulations!
You have been selected as one of the 50 winners who will receive a premium Vintec wine chiller for your participation in our wines’ nationwide campaign.
Please proceed to email us your delivery details from now till 28 July 2017 and we will contact you shortly regarding the delivery.
Contact person for delivery:
Contact person mobile:
Delivery address:
Enjoy your wines!
Jacob’s Creek team
If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
